## Source: amazon-inspector (738f7e12a3460319bb92fc9f4034834db18cc52dbabc5b7f1b94a8fc07fcf215)
The package elf-stats-midnight-saddlebag-720 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (17612f1c329b1c57903c3c5c973f504da6332745de6e1c61bca69954df9a7cb3)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'elf-stats-midnight-saddlebag-720' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
